plot outline: A group of people receives life-threatening messages on their mobile phones. Although the messages can be deleted there is no escape from it. The victims of such messages are two friends of the female protagonist (played by Divya Rao), who are brutally murdered. Traumatized by the event, her condition worsens further when she sees the actual recording of the murdered friends on their own mobile phones.
title: 9 Hilton House
plot: While filming at a location, members of the crew begin to encounter strange paranormal incidents and warding off people exploiting them.

A group of people receives life-threatening messages on their mobile phones. Although the messages can be deleted there is no escape from it. The victims of such messages are two friends of the female protagonist (played by Divya Rao), who are brutally murdered. Traumatized by the event, her condition worsens further when she sees the actual recording of the murdered friends on their own mobile phones.
